723077f-a.text:
(1)
6-10 Rutgers Street,the Parochial School of St. Teresa's Roman Catholic Church at, adjoining, and south of the S.W. corner of East Broadway. The two buildings, Nos. 8-10 will be renovated. On the extreme left appears a portion of St. Teresa's Roman Catholic Church, located at
the N.W. corner of Henry Street.
April 20, 1931.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
The same, at a later date.
March 19, 1934.
P. L. Sperr.
